objects.description: Ensure event tracers/forwarders (Citation: Microsoft ETW May 2018), firewall policies, and other associated mechanisms are secured with appropriate permissions and access controls. Consider automatically relaunching forwarding mechanisms at recurring intervals (ex: temporal, on-logon, etc.) as well as applying appropriate change management to firewall rules and other related system configurations.
objects.name: Indicator Blocking Mitigation

external_references.description: Microsoft. (2018, May 30). Event Tracing. Retrieved September 6, 2018.
